title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 that focus on dataset construction and the methodological issues associated with it. These articles cover a range of topics including data collection, annotation, bias, and validation
**"ImageNet Large Scale Visual Recognition Challenge"** by Olga Russakovsky et al
Discusses the construction and challenges of the ImageNet dataset
**"The PASCAL Visual Object Classes (VOC) Challenge"** by Mark Everingham et al
Details the creation and evaluation of the PASCAL VOC dataset
Common Objects in Context"** by Tsung-Yi Lin et al
Explores the methodology behind the COCO dataset and its unique challenges
**"SQuAD: 100,000+ Questions for Machine Comprehension of Text"** by Pranav Rajpurkar et al
Discusses the creation of the SQuAD dataset for machine comprehension
**"Linguistic Bias in Machine Translation"** by Antonio Toral
Examines biases in machine translation datasets and their implications
**"Datasheets for Datasets"** by Timnit Gebru et al
Proposes a standardized approach to documenting datasets to address methodological issues
**"The Stanford Question Answering Dataset"** by Rajpurkar et al
Focuses on the construction and challenges of the Stanford Question Answering Dataset (SQuAD
**"A Survey on Bias and Fairness in Machine Learning"** by Mehrabi et al
Reviews various types of biases in datasets and their impact on machine learning models
**"Crowdsourcing Annotations for Visual Object Detection"** by Sorokin and Forsyth
Discusses the use of crowdsourcing for dataset annotation and associated challenges
**"The Role of Data in AI Ethics"** by Luciano Floridi and Josh Cowls
Explores ethical considerations in dataset construction
**"Gender Shades: Intersectional Accuracy Disparities in Commercial Gender Classification"** by Joy Buolamwini and Timnit Gebru
Investigates biases in facial recognition datasets
Discusses issues related to learning from datasets with label proportions rather than individual labels
**"The Open Images Dataset V4"** by Alina Kuznetsova et al
Details the creation and challenges of the Open Images Dataset
**"Understanding the Limitations of CNN-based Absolute Camera Pose Regression"** by Walch et al
Examines the limitations of datasets used for camera pose regression
**"The MNIST Database of Handwritten Digits"** by LeCun et al
Describes the creation and challenges of the MNIST dataset
**"Bias in Bios: A Case Study of Semantic Representation Bias in a High-Stakes Setting"** by De-Arteaga et al
Investigates biases in datasets used for professional bios
**"The Role of Data in Algorithmic Decision Making"** by Barocas
Discusses the impact of dataset biases on algorithmic decision-making
**"A Critical Review of the Assumptions Underlying Machine Learning"** by Sculley et al
Reviews assumptions and methodological issues in machine learning datasets
**"The Visual Genome Dataset: Connecting Language and Vision Using Crowdsourced Dense Image Annotations"** by Krishna et al
Explores the creation and challenges of the Visual Genome dataset
**"Bias and Fairness in Natural Language Processing"** by Caliskan et al
Discusses biases in NLP datasets and their implications for fairness
These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the various challenges and methodological issues associated with dataset construction across different domains
